title: FAIL TO RECONNECT
body:
A Riot games support agent suggested i post this request here in hope to get the attention of the right people,

The problem i submitted was that whenever a summoner's **IP address changes** mid game (due to internet reset or other causes) **the game FAILS to reconnect,**
And the only way to resume is by **closing the game and restarting it** (which takes a lot of time instead of seconds _especially for not so fast machines_).
You're all welcome to try it as did one of the Riot support agents and confirmed it.

I want to indicate that this is a pb nation wide (our _"only"_ Internet Service Provider gives dynamic IP)

What i suggest is for the game to recognize the changed IP address and **not use it to identify the summoner**.

Thank you.

replies.body: Why are you posting this from an EUW account onto OCE?
I thought this was general (the support guy gave me the link), but the pb is still the same
